item.title: 使用USB连接打印机会遇到的问题
item.description: 使用USB连接打印机会遇到的问题 比如说客人前台收银小票机使用的是USB连接，但是重启还不行的话如下步骤 当客人那边使用USB线连接到POS系统

item.title: Public Surcharge Set up
item.description: Login to you PosPal account on Back Office PosPal Login Website: https://anz.pospal.cn/ <!DOCTYPE html> Title and then on Left-hand side find Settings —> System Settings <!DOCTYPE html> Title on Right-hand side find Sales tax & Service tax setting Press Edit <!DOCTYPE html> Title and change Service Fee to any Public Surcharge you want to set and Save <!DOCTYPE html> Title Video Down Below👇

item.title: 公共假期手续费设置
item.description: 登入到银豹后台 银豹登入链接: https://anz.pospal.cn/ <!DOCTYPE html> Title 在左手边找到 设置 —> 系统设置 <!DOCTYPE html> Title 在右手边找到 消费税服务费设置 点击 编辑 <!DOCTYPE html> Title 这样在 服务费 中修改任何你想加收

item.title: 打印机不出单排查步骤
item.description: 1. 确定店内网络是否正常 2. 检查打印机是否开机 3. 检查打印机网线是否连接 4. 检查打印机IP地址是否与银豹系统里的IP地址相同 5. 检查系统是否收到单子 6.

item.title: Using a mobile hotspot to Login the PosPal system without internet access

item.title: 1 PosPal POS Training-Android Version
item.description: 1 Login to POSPAL System 2 Handover on POS 3 Reprint Tax Invoice 4 Refund on POSPAL end 5 Set sold out item on POS end 6 Restore Stock on POS 7 Change or Increase Price on POS 8 Hold order under Table No., Normally Using for Pay after or Phone Takeaway 9 Complete Order under Table No. 10 Order and Go on POS 11 Choose Item Flavour on POS 12 Data synchronization on POS when did lots of change on Back-end 13 Change Item names on POS 14 Open Cash Drawer on POS 15 Temporary Holding Order on POS 16 Bind Kitchen IP address or KDS IP address on POS 17 Check Ethernet IP Address on Main POS Machine 18 Check Wi-Fi IP address on Main POS 19 Add Main POS IP Address on Secondary POS 20 Bind Item to specified Kitchen Printer on POS end 21 Add new Item on POS end 22 Items connect to Kitchen Printer 23 Split Bill Choose Episode on Top Right Corner
